title: How Pictures From NASA’s Webb Space Telescope Were Selected
description: In June, specialists gathered in Baltimore to select images from the James Webb Space Telescope to share with the public. Keeping the results to themselves hasn’t been easy.
dc:creator: Joshua Sokol
media:credit: Michael A. McCoy for The New York Times
media:description: A live feed of the presentation of the James Webb Space Telescope’s first images played during a simultaneous event at the Space Telescope Science Institute in Baltimore on Tuesday.
